QUESTION

If a husband while fasting penetrates his wife in the morning after sehri ends in such a way that  she has her knickers on without ejaculating will it nullify the fast?plz inform massalaama

ANSWER


Share:

The fast will not be invalidated. However, the act of the husband is against the spirit of fasting which is exercising restraint on one’s desires and inculcating Taqwa.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
